short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Colors and sorts the scores of Hacker News pages according to score.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color-codes the scores of Hacker News entries based on score, where dark (near black) is low score and bright red is high scores. The entries are also sorted by score from highest to lowest.
